document.full_text: the blowout preventer that should have stopped the bp oil spill cold failed because of faulty design and a bent piece of pipe, a testing firm hired by the government said wednesday in a report that appears to shift some blame for the disaster away from the oil giant and toward those who built and maintained the 300-ton safety device.
document.title: probe blames pipe piece in blowout preventer failure
lines_and_colors: the blowout preventer that should have stopped the bp oil spill cold failed because of faulty design and a bent piece of pipe, a testing firm hired by the government said wednesday in a report that appears to shift some blame for the disaster away from the oil giant and toward those who built and maintained the 300-ton safety device.
